text:
1. Position the body in a balanced stance.
2. Grip the cricket bat firmly.
3. Watch the bowler's delivery.
4. Judge the line and length of the ball.
5. Move the front foot forward and towards the line of the ball.
6. Swing the bat in a controlled manner.
7. Make contact with the ball using the middle of the bat.
8. Follow through with the bat after hitting the ball.
9. Assess the direction and speed of the ball.
10. Decide whether to run or continue batting based on the shot's outcome.
